tags: Contract of the Ministry of Defense
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Notice of Proposed Procurement

### Tender Information

* **Tender Reference Number**: cb-747-51547282
* **Tender Solicitation Number**: W8485-258194/A
* **Publication Date**: 2024-06-18
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-07-17 14:00:00 (EDT)
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-07-17
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-03-31

### Procurement Category

* **Category**: Goods
* **Method**: Competitive Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Multiple Agreements (Please see below for details)

### Procurement Details

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for self-contained breathing apparatus. The requirement is for:

* **Quantity**: 300 units
* **Unit of Issue**: Each (EA)
* **Delivery**: 25 CFSD Montreal, Ontario, Canada (to be completed by August 2024)
* **Technical Specifications**: MR-10035N, NSN: 4240-01-615-0712, NCAGE: 0U058

### Bids Requirements

* Bids must include a completed response to the tender document
* Equivalent or substitute products must include brand name, model number, and NCAGE
* Documents must be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French)

### Contact Information

* **Contract Officer**: Dany Lebel
* **Email**: dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (000) 000-0000

### Documents

The tender document can be found at:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40385/w8485-258194.a---rfp---canada-buy---en.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40385/w8485-258194.a---ddp---achats-canada---fr.pdf (French) 
Note: Bidders are encouraged to submit their bids electronically. Due to COVID-19 pandemic, business hours may be reduced, and personnel may be limited.
